overview: The story revolves around three boys: Amar, Arjun and Rakesh who fall for the same girl, Suniti. We are introduced to Amar who is a well natured and cultured boy, with whom Suniti naturally falls in love with. While everything seems right in their relationship, a poor village worker, Arjun, mistakes the good behavior of Suniti and her father with their affection for him, and starts fantasizing a romantic relationship with Suniti. Rakesh however, tries to bring Amar down by tricking Suniti into marrying him by force.
title: Kusume Rumal
